creator: william.beene@accenture.com
text:
This patch causes the JNDIRealm to bind with the credentials passed in by the user if user lookup fails when bound anonymously.

I have updated the patch from http://markmail.org/message/qrmrubh3gfrz5yo5 to
match up with the current source release for tomcat 6.0.18.

My environment:
Java: 1.5.0_16
OS: Debian Testing (2.6.26)
Tomcat: 6.0.18

Thanks,
William Beene

creator: william.beene@accenture.com
text:
Created attachment 22578
Patch that this entry references.

creator: seth.leger@raritan.com
text: Excellent! Thanks for porting my patch forward and getting it committed! SVN revision 712038.
This patch has been included in the Tomcat distribution since version 6.0.21. I guess the bug can be closed?
creator: cdauth+issues.apache.org@cdauth.de
